Author: vrd
Title: [ANN] [PRESALE] INDICOIN - BLOCKCHAIN REDEFINING SOCIAL SERVICE
Body: Here, at Indicoin we have not confined ourself to the single social issue, the social Service/social tasks are categorized on the basis of the 17 SDGs laid down by UN. The users can also browse and Search the Decentralized application on the basis of different SDGs, as categories.  To upload a social proof of work, the user will select the category and then share his proposal. After this, the user will upload the proof, which can be anything like a live video, images, documents, or anything that provides a solid ground for the proposal to be validated or curated.

Title: [ANN] [PRESALE] INDICOIN - BLOCKCHAIN REDEFINING SOCIAL SERVICE
Body: I liked the idea. I go to your website and what's the first thing I see? Its on wordpress. I was turned off instantly. Second, I see you've used autogenerated passwords for profile and I couldn't find a way to change it. While its a good security measures for people who are not tech-lit but advanced users are going to be pissed off I am sure.  Also, try to make your content publicly available and not blocked from anyone that's not registered. Thats like being against the very DNA of the social change for everyone motto you guys are sporting.

Author: kzzircuit
Title: [ANN] [PRESALE] INDICOIN - BLOCKCHAIN REDEFINING SOCIAL SERVICE
Body: I am all for the social causes and activities that bring benefit to the people at large but I am not getting the flow-of-the things yet.  I still have questions for the founders, maybe they can give us more insights: - Why is there a need of "block-chain" in social welfare? - Even if block-chain is needed, why do you need a new "token" and not use ETH or other digital assets, after-all it is a social cause you should be targeting.  It is mostly looking like the game-tokens you distribute to your players when they win/do something. Its used on many online/mobile games, chat-sites, dating-sites, ...  - Well, the ICO will help you raise money to make your website/platform etc... - When someone shows a proof-of-social-work, the token owners will show their appreciation by transferring to them. - The team/person that did social work, would earn some tokens, what does he do with that? - He exchanges that token for some fiat-money to cover his costs? - Suppose he incurred a huge cost, while he/she got only some minimal tokens as appreciation? Where is the motivation? - What makes the value of the token increase in value from current 1 Rupee?  Would really appreciate more clarity, as we all like social-welfare to happen (beyond what the governments are capable for or willing  to do)

Author: vrd
Title: [ANN] [PRESALE] INDICOIN - BLOCKCHAIN REDEFINING SOCIAL SERVICE
Body: The formation and development of this idea originated in India hence it is named such. But Indicoin is a globally tradeable cryptocurrency just like any other altcoin. Our Indicoin platform will be available to use anywhere in the world. Hence a broad mass of people can join in our mission of social welfare.

Author: vrd
Title: [ANN] [PRESALE] INDICOIN - BLOCKCHAIN REDEFINING SOCIAL SERVICE
Body: Its always said that social workers make no money, but through Indicoins you can support a good cause and get rewarded for the same. Wondering how? Indicoin provides a platform where only proposals benefiting the society are posted. These proposals then get voted on by The community and they become targets. Upon successful completion and provision of proof of the work, Indicoin is distributed to the user as well as the voters. These Indicoins hopefully can be converted into any other alt coin or can directly be converted into INR in near future as the community grows.

Author: leslie4u
Title: [ANN] [PRESALE] INDICOIN - BLOCKCHAIN REDEFINING SOCIAL SERVICE
Body: Sounds like a plan, however, I do have few questions-  1) Is a normal user/personnel allowed to send in the ideas for improvement, if yes how? 2) How long one needs to wait for voting to complete? 3) Who decides the dead of project completion? 4) Who monitors the projection execution? 5) Who funds the proposed change/idea? 6) How do you plan to battle the corruption and obstacles that you will come across in executing the selected project tasks?  Thanks and have a nice day.

Author: INDICOIN
Title: [ANN] [PRESALE] INDICOIN - BLOCKCHAIN REDEFINING SOCIAL SERVICE
Body: hello,  1. If the user/personnel has no prior connection with Indicoin, he/she can send in the ideas for improvement and the members of the committee then decide whether or not the idea is viable and can ultimately do some good to society. But if an INDI holder wants a special proposal which would help shape the society better, then it would be listed as any other proposal which can either be upvoted or downvoted. However, to speed things up and make better grasp over the idea the member can induce the "critical" option embedded within DApp.  2. Voting is completed as soon as consensus is reached. If a consensus is not reached i.e the community chooses not to vote the proposal will be rejected and no coins will be distributed, There will be various parameters at every stage to earn Indicoins as the reward which includes the importance of the document, voting pattern of users, whether raised under the provided timestamp etc.  3. The date of completion will be decided both by the user and the community. The user will have the opportunity to input a specific period of time according to social proof starting the voting process. After the time is over or a consensus reached whichever earlier, the project will be deemed completed.  4. The execution of any proposal would not be moderated or monitored by any specific person or group because this is a DApp and which works on the transparent voting process. If however, some member notices some discrepancy in voting then he can send his feedback. Senior member will then review the query received. The more your proposals are successfully passed you raise your level.  The community monitors the project execution , The actual proof of work provided by the user will be voted upon by the community . If the community deems the project is appropriate and the evidence substantial then indicoin will be distributed to the user .  5. If the proposed idea/change will be upvoted and funded by the donations of community members. Donations will be accepted and managed for community development programs. Initial funds will be used if DApp needs to be developed and managed over time.  6. First of all, uploaded documents cannot be deleted so it leads to a platform of true facts and figures which are approved by the community and cannot be forged or misused. So, it avoids the condition where one can delete and repost the same proposal over and over again. Along with that, the community members who downvoted the proposal will be rewarded Indicoins. The tokens allocated for that particular proposal will be equally distributed between downvotes. This way the battle corruption that we will come across in executing the selected project tasks would be won, and multiple smart contract and integration would help us to overcome the obstacles that we would come across.   Please spare some time to read our whitepaper if you're still having some query or ask us. We are open to your advice and feedback. Thank you for your interest in Indicoin.Type a message

Author: mihir
Title: [ANN] [PRESALE] INDICOIN - BLOCKCHAIN REDEFINING SOCIAL SERVICE
Body: Indicoin is basically a ethereum based social service platform in which the community members gets reward(Indicoin) for raising proposals and voting for the proposals raised through the platform. As when people will be rewarded with some thing like indicoin by doing something good towards society then it will motivate people to do good. More and more people will come in it and demand will go up for Indicoin. Let me explain you in detail.  I am a community member. Any Indicoin holder is a community member. I raise a proposal of doing any task which helps in the upliftment of society say for example I am planting a number of trees.  So what I do now is I raise a proposal. The proposal now gets reviewed by other community members. This proof of work is now reviewed by other members of the platform by a transparent and unbiased voting process. The group members will either upvote it or downvote it. Upvote means they are satisfied that I really did it, downvote it if it seems that I did the trick and didn't actually do the job. As a whole, votes will be calculated and if I really did plant the tree I'll be rewarded Indicoins  This is just one example I am illustrating. There are million other ways in which one can someone other or society as a whole. We would be glad if you'd spare some time to visit our Website or read our Whitepaper.

Author: INDICOIN
Title: [ANN] [PRESALE] INDICOIN - BLOCKCHAIN REDEFINING SOCIAL SERVICE
Body: WEBSITE | FACEBOOK | TWITTER | LINKEDIN | SLACK | TELEGRAM                                                                                                  "Indicoin- Blockchain redefining Social Service" is an autonomous cryptocurrency and a 1st ever social service platform that enables users provide social proof to the community through a  decentralized, unbiased and transparent voting process thereby incentivizing and encouraging the user to create an inclusive community of people who are incentivized to do socially positive and constructive tasks. https://www.indicoin.org.in/wp-content/uploads/2017/09/2.jpg  We are pleased to announce that Indicoin token sale would be the first ever Token Sale/ICO officially covering the Indian cryptocurrency market where people can buy Indicoin in ETH and BTC. Our mission is to create awareness among 1.2 billion unaware Indians about cryptocurrency and blockchain ecosystem and also create a sense of social accountability among individuals.   Indicoin is a first ever social platform where people can not only contribute but also validate through any kind of content posted anonymously from anywhere, anytime and also earn through it.    WEBSITE  OVERVIEW OF THE PROJECT  WHITEPAPER   Vision and Mission   Indicoin is a platform Independent, self-governing social service DApp for a community of people who really want to contribute to the society. Indicoin aims to use the technology of Blockchain and Smart Contracts to provide meaningful tasks to the user community and linking a monetary value (indicoins) on these tasks.The Indicoin project recognizes that an extremely ignorant and inconsiderate amount of the human population's attention which plays a significant role in aggravating the inequalities inherent in our society. By administering an efficient virtual platform that controls the power of digital currencies, blockchain ledgers, IPFS and physical world ethics we are enacting a completely individualistic and autonomic system, acquitted from the political quirks of any nation, that is capable of causing a positive impact on people’s lives by allowing them to undertake tasks related to the welfare and upliftment of the society and also grant eloquent recurring income to all those eager to engage.    REGISTER FOR TOKEN SALE ON OUR WEBSITE    ROADMAP   ---Q2(2017)-----Q3(2017)----Q4(2017)-----Q1(2018)---                                                                                                                   Q2 (2017): 1. Concept Development and Research 2. Domain name registered  Q3 (2017): 1. Whitepaper and platform development 2. Initial Part Team creation 3. Project initiated with local NGOs support and affiliation 4. Community development 5. Token Presale  Q4 (2017): 1. Non-Profit organization registration 2. Token Sale 3. Listing on exchanges 4. Audit and Revision 5. Community Plan Update a. Indicoin Comm-Tech conferences and token summit b. The community meet up c. Hackathon for project development d. Bug bounties  Q1 (2018): 1. Distribution protocol updated 2. Integration of Independent Indicoin DApp 3. Smart contract for Social vault development 4. Collaboration with non-profit organizations and other social partners 5. Incubation and community center setups all over the world     FUND TIMELINE   1-----------2-----------3-----------4----------5   1: Platform and ICO Website launch 2: Token Distribution 3: Smart Contract Development (Addition of Social vault Smart Contract, Ad Smart Contract etc.) 4: Various promotional events and conferences across the globe to spread awareness in the field of social service and application of Indicoin platform in the field. 5: Release fully integrated platform suitable for Public Release.     PRESALE TERMS AND CONDITIONS   The INDICOIN Token (INDI) is developed to address the broken social sector. INDI, an ERC20 token built on top of Ethereum, will be the unit of exchange in a new, decentralized, open source and efficient blockchain-based digital cyptocurrency. SYMBOL: INDI INDICOIN will offer 400,000,000 INDI tokens (40%) in PRESALE and Token Sale Total coins = 1 billion    FIRST TOKEN SALE HAPPENING IN INDIA  To encourage awareness in Indian cryptocurrency ecosystem and to increase demand and stabled liquidity, bonuses will be given to the early investors. In other words, those who participate in the PRESALE will get more tokens for the same price as compared to those who participate in the Early Adopter Sale and ICO. Those who participate at the later stages will eventually get tokens according to the regular set price of the token.  PRESALE (20,000,000 tokens) rate is 1 ETH = 20,000 INDI Token Sale rate is 1 ETH = 12,500 INDI *Rates are subject to change according to market conditions.    TIMING  ENTIRE Token Sale will happen between September 10, 2017 to November 01, 2017   PRESALE starts on September 10, 2017 at 12:00 IST PRESALE will end automatically after 10 days of commencemnet or once 1500 ETH's are collected, whichever comes first after that the Token sale will start with reduced bonuses. All unused tokens will be burnt.    TEAM  http://www.indicoin.org.in/team    BOUNTY   Bounty Campaign is open at http://www.indicoin.org.in/indicoin-community-buildup-program Bitcointalk thread bounty announcement:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2142876.   FOLLOW US:  Facebook Twitter Medium Telegram Youtube  bitcointalk thread reference   For any Query: contact@indicoin.org.in   Translation & Local Community Management Bounty: For translating Major spoken languages Russian- termion- https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2159335 Indonesian- kaneki007- https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2149912 Filipino- Coin_trader- https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2148087.0 Portugese- sabotag3x- https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2155042.0

Author: mihir
Title: [ANN] [PRESALE] INDICOIN - BLOCKCHAIN REDEFINING SOCIAL SERVICE
Body: The project is named such because of the location of its inception and its need in the current marketplace in India which has high irregularities in its processes to distribute funds for social welfare. Indicoin being a digital currency is open to all that are willing to buy and will be a tradable currency from any part of the world. Also, the indicoin platform will be made to accommodate all regions so that any user from any part of the globe can use the platform to create and fulfill tasks related to some social cause or general community development. Minimum fund goal is set at 1,500 ETH's and maximum fund goal is set at 20,000 ETH's for first two phases. Fund goal for the last phase will be decided upon the successful completion of earlier stages.  Team Indicoin

Author: imjustsayintho
Title: [ANN] [PRESALE] INDICOIN - BLOCKCHAIN REDEFINING SOCIAL SERVICE
Body: Why couldn't Indians just use ETH?  What are you trying to solve, offer or build?

Author: vrd
Title: [ANN] [PRESALE] INDICOIN - BLOCKCHAIN REDEFINING SOCIAL SERVICE
Body: The social welfare and development system in India as well as all over the world poses some discrete irregularities such as the questionable distribution of funds within the social welfare sector. We plan to decentralize the entire payment gateway so that the allocated funds reach their intended targets. And you asked for why Indians couldn't just use ETH? And that's because Most Indians don't even use Bitcoin and that's what we are trying to change by helping them to shift from the traditional debt based economy.
